meanings.definition: A fleshy extension at the back of the soft palate that hangs above the throat.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the patient's uvulas to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent2: When you yawn, you can sometimes feel your uvulas move.
meanings.sent3: The uvulas of the clown costume were comically oversized.
meanings.sent4: Her singing voice was so beautiful, it felt like her uvulas were creating music.
meanings.sent5: The uvulas of the lion costume added a fierce touch to the school play.

meanings.definition: The uvula is responsible for preventing food and liquid from entering the nasal cavity during swallowing.
meanings.sent1: Swallow carefully to ensure your uvulas do their job effectively.
meanings.sent2: The uvulas play a crucial role in keeping our airways clear.
meanings.sent3: The uvulas in the bodyguard's throat worked tirelessly to protect his airway.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like arrows, aiming straight for the uvulas of his conscience.
meanings.sent5: The uvulas of the gatekeeper ensured only the right nutrients entered the body.
